5.eng-name: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) as saying:Seek refuge with Allah from the torment of Hell, seek refuge with Allah from the torment of the grave, and seek refuge with Allah from the trial of Masih al-Dajjal and seek refuge with Allah from the trial of life and death

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُسْتَعَاذُ مِنْهُ فِي الصَّلاَةِ
chapter.eng-name: From what refuge is to be sought when in salat
